overview: "Tara" is a movie written and directed by Kaveh Ghahraman and produced in 2018.  Synopsis: Tara is on the verge of making a decision that her husband Bahram is unaware of. A decision that is going to change the course of this couple's life. This is the basis for the film to tell the story of the past, present and future of Tara and Bahram's relationship. The past, present and future are intertwined like a dream.
title: Tara
